title: Defence Budget: With IOR Focus, Navy Gets 43% Capital Outlay Hike, Army Modernisation Funds Dip 12.2% - News18
content:
1. Defence Budget: With IOR Focus, Navy Gets 43% Capital Outlay Hike, Army Modernisation Funds Dip 12.2%  News18
  2. Strong push for indigenous weapons amidst modest hike in defence budget  Times of India
  3. Budget 2022 | 'Defence Capex for Domestic Industry Upped to 68%': Nirmala Sitharaman | The Quint  The Quint
  4. Budget 2022 | FM raises domestic defence procurement; invites private sector into military research  Moneycontrol
  5. Budget 2022: Defence stocks rally up to 5% on boost to local sourcing  Economic Times
  6. View Full coverage on Google News
description: Budget 2022: Defence budget of Rs 5.25 lakh crore a jump of 9.82% over allocations in last fiscal. Significant policy changes announced for promoting self-reliance in defence sector, including 25% earmarking of R&D funds, 68% capital procurement budget for domestic industry and Rs 3,810 crore for 7 new defence PSUs.
